org.openscience.cdk.formula

Class MassToFormulaTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openscience.cdk.formula.MassToFormulaTool

  • @TestClass(value="org.openscience.cdk.formula.MassToFormulaToolTest")
public class MassToFormulaTool
extends Object

    Tool to determine molecular formula consistent with a given accurate mass. The molecular formulas are not validate. It only consist in generate combination according object (see MolecularFormulaChecker). The algorithm is published in Rojas-Cherto M. et.al. [Rojas-Cherto, Miguel and Kasper, Piotr T and Willighagen, Egon L and Vreeken, R. and Hankemeier, Thomas and Reijmers, Theo, Elemental Composition determination based on MSn, Bioinformatics, 2011, :]. 

       MassToFormulaTool mf = new MassToFormulaTool();
   double myMass = 133.004242;
   IMolecularFormulaSet mfSet = mf.generate(myMass);

    The elements are listed according on difference with the proposed mass.

    Author:
    miguelrojasch
    Created on:
    2007-03-01
    Belongs to CDK module:
    formula
    Source code:
    master
